Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-20506 affecting package clamav for versions less than 1.0.7-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-20506 affecting package clamav for versions less than 1.0.7-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package clamav is earlier than 1.0.7-1, affected by CVE-2024-20506
